players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."

Charlie: "Based on the information we have, it seems that one of us is a mafia member. I believe that being open and honest with each other will help us make the best decision for the village. Therefore, I suggest that we all share our thoughts and reasoning during this discussion round."
